column5: Vorlaufsolltemperatur: Desired flow temperature of MK1
Außentemp. Sensor: current outside temperature (valid only if a sensor is connected to the VR60)
Ferienprogramm aktiv: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; holiday function can be started by setting the HC's corresponding bit
Partyfunktion aktiv: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; if bit is set the party function is activated for the corresponding HC
Sparfunktion: saving function is activated until read value * 1/2 h
Speicherladung aktiv: heating circuit is locked because of ongoing tank loading unless parallel loading has been activated
HK2-P: Status of mixer cicuit pump on MK1P

column15: Type of the configurable mixer circuit
Type of the configurable mixer circuit

column5: Betriebsart: Operating mode of mixer circuit
Betriebsart: Operating mode of mixer circuit
Solltemperatur: Day temperature setpoint of the circuit
Solltemperatur: Day temperature setpoint of the circuit
Absenksollwert: Night temperature setpoint of the circuit
Absenksollwert: Night temperature setpoint of the circuit
AT-Abschaltgrenze: For outside temperatures higher than this, there is no heat demand generated anymore
AT-Abschaltgrenze: For outside temperatures higher than this, there is no heat demand generated anymore
Pumpensperrzeit: Time pump is not running in a pause at least
Pumpensperrzeit: Time pump is not running in a pause at least
Minimaler Vorlaufsollwert: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will at least be this value
Minimaler Vorlaufsollwert: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will at least be this value
Maximaler Vorlaufsollwert: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will maximal be this value
Maximaler Vorlaufsollwert: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will maximal be this value
Max. Voraufheizung: The heating start before a time window could shifted forwards maximal this time (related to the outside temperature)
Max. Voraufheizung: The heating start before a time window could shifted forwards maximal this time (related to the outside temperature)
TeleSWITCH Betriebsart: If the tele switch port is activated the mixer circuit operates in this mode
TeleSWITCH Betriebsart: If the tele switch port is activated the mixer circuit operates in this mode
Estrichtrocknungstag: Current day of floor paving drying routine
Estrichtrocknungstag: Current day of floor paving drying routine
24h Mittelwert Aussentemperatur: Outside temperature mean value over 24 hours
Betriebsart Kühlen: Operating mode of cooling circuit
Betriebsart Kühlen: Operating mode of cooling circuit
